Pianolibrary.org is looking for contributors.

Back to Edvard Grieg

Edvard Grieg

Three Pieces, EG 110–112

c. 1898

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 11'

  • 1. White Clouds, EG 110
  • 2. Procession of Gnomes, EG 111
  • 3. In the Whirl of the Dance, EG 112

These pieces were edited and published together after Grieg’s death by Julius Röntgen.

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · IV/20 · Addenda et corrigenda · ed. Rune Andersen / Finn Benestad / Klaus Henning Oelmann [nos. 1–3, with nos. 1–2 only in facsimiles of the first edition]
  • Könemann · K 188 · Holberg-Suite and Moods, Song Arrangements · ed. Thomas Aßmus [no. 3]

1. White Clouds, EG 110

Grieg left this piece incomplete; it was first published and is most familiar in a completion by Julius Röntgen.

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Procession of Gnomes, EG 111

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

3. In the Whirl of the Dance, EG 112

This piece was originally intended to be in book 9 of the Lyric Pieces (op. 68).

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
